text: Colonization of the different sections of the oviduct was investigated comparing overall RRT - PCR positivity , TCID 50 values , virus loads and IHC scores . The infundibulum resulted positive by RRT - PCR in a higher number of birds on days 4 and 6 pi ( Table 2 ) , while virus load ( Additional file 2 ) and TCID 50 values did not differ significantly among the oviduct sections .
